title: Death in the Gulf Stream Recipe
full_text:
Death in the Gulf Stream Recipe

Serves

Cook Mode

Ingredients
Peeled zest
and
1
tablespoon
juice
from
1
whole
lime
4
dashes
Angostura bitters
1
teaspoon
simple syrup
(optional)
3
ounces
genever
(see note)
Directions
Fill a tall chimney-style glass nearly full of crushed ice. Add the lime peel, lime juice, bitters, and simple syrup (if using). Top with Genever and stir. Serve immediately.
